name: Purge the World
description:
Purge the World  is an Endless Runner game. You play as a mightful paladin whose goal is to kill all these heretics (it is also my first public game).

I'll try to update it frequently (maybe once a week if you're a good boi/gurl) and I have some ideas to improve the game and to add super cool content in the future.

The game will be released on PC and Android. (In order to release it on iOs/Osx, I need to have a Mac and I actually don't have one). Also, there is two ways of installing the game on PC : a classic installer and a .zip file. If the installer doesn't work, try the zip cause i've noticed some issues.

Future Super Cool Content (F.S.C.C.)

Random stuff :

  • Add music (normally in a few days)
  • Pause Menu
  • Player death sound effect
  • Background (Clouds, town, castle...). Environment will change randomly
  • Some crappy backstory

Ennemies :

  • Cute redhead witch (flying ennemy)
  • Scientists who wants to prove that earth is a ball
  • Boss : Social Justice Warrior : well he does what his hame suggests but heretic anyway
  • Women who wants rights

Gameplay :

  • Some kind of laser beam in order to shoot witches (the right-click animation on PC)
  • Boss fights
